name: Oracle
description: Mystical seers who can glimpse the threads of fate and harness divine visions to guide, protect, and manipulate destiny.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Mystical energy that powers divination spells and prophecies
resource_systems.regeneration: 1 per 6 seconds, +2 when successfully predicting an event
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast divination spells and invoke prophecies
Some abilities require maintaining a connection to the future, consuming mana over time
Meditation increases mana regeneration rate by 300% but prevents movement

resource_systems.name: Fate Points
resource_systems.description: Accumulated knowledge of possible futures that can be spent to alter destiny
resource_systems.regeneration: 1 per long rest, additional points gained through significant divinations
mechanics: Fate Points can be spent to reroll dice for self or allies
Can be used to force a critical success or failure on a single action
Powerful destiny-altering abilities consume multiple Fate Points

class_mechanics.name: Divination
class_mechanics.description: The ability to glimpse possible futures and gain insight into events
effects: Can cast divination spells to gain information about people, places, or events
Higher-level divinations reveal more detailed and accurate information
Successful divinations grant temporary bonuses to related skill checks

class_mechanics.name: Prophecy
class_mechanics.description: The ability to predict and influence future events
effects: Can declare prophecies that grant bonuses or penalties based on fulfillment
Self-fulfilling prophecies provide powerful buffs when conditions are met
Doom prophecies apply debuffs to enemies when triggered by specific actions

class_mechanics.name: Fate Weaving
effects: Can subtly alter the outcome of events by manipulating probability
Provides passive bonuses to saving throws and resistance checks
Can protect allies from critical hits by weaving protective fate threads

skill_trees.name: Seer
key_abilities: Vision Quest: Enter a trance to receive detailed visions about a specific target
Scrying Eye: Remote viewing of distant locations or people
Portent: Predict the outcome of specific actions before they occur

skill_trees.name: Prophet
key_abilities: Divine Proclamation: Declare a prophecy that grants powerful buffs when fulfilled
Words of Doom: Curse enemies with inevitable consequences for specific actions
Destiny Marker: Tag individuals or locations as significant to future events

skill_trees.name: Fatespinner
key_abilities: Thread Cutting: Sever a target's connection to a possible future
Probability Shift: Increase or decrease the likelihood of specific outcomes
Destiny Bond: Link the fates of two individuals for shared benefits or consequences

bonuses: Can see one additional future possibility when using Portent
Prophecies have a 20% wider area of effect
Fate Weaving abilities are 15% more effective
Can reroll failed divination attempts once per day

arch_classes.name: Fateweaver
arch_classes.description: Oracles who have mastered the manipulation of destiny and can weave the threads of fate to create powerful effects.
skill_requirements: At least 5 points in any oracle skill tree
Completion of the 'Threads of Destiny' quest

starting_equipment: Divination focus (crystal ball, scrying mirror, or rune stones)
lore: Oracles are individuals blessed—or cursed—with the ability to glimpse the threads of fate that bind all living beings. Through meditation, ritual, and innate talent, they can peer beyond the veil of the present to witness possible futures and gain insights into events past and present. Some oracles receive their powers through divine blessing, while others are born with an innate connection to the cosmic tapestry of destiny. Regardless of their origin, all oracles bear the burden of knowledge that others do not possess, seeing the consequences of actions before they unfold. Many struggle with the weight of this responsibility, knowing when to share their visions and when to let fate run its course. Oracles often serve as advisors to the powerful, guides to the lost, or manipulators working from the shadows to ensure their preferred futures come to pass.
